reviewText: This video is typical of the recent high-quality releases from Playboy. It includes a half dozen scenes, most of them well-produced sequences of playmates getting into and out of different lingerie, with a few nice  lesbian scenes thrown in for good measure. The women are beautiful (most  are true Playboy models, not hired actresses), the shots are moderately  explicit (by Playboy standards), and the scenarios a bit dull but still  erotic. Nothing extraordinary here, and the video is a little short (more  along the lines of 50 minutes than a full hour) but a well-made video all  around.

This video features many attractive women in various lingerie!
I usually don't watch Playboy videos, and the reason is probably because the first time I saw a Playboy video, I found it to be very tame and boring. I then  said to myself that I would never watch another one.
However, after  reading the reviews about this video here at Amazon, I ended up buying this  video, and I must say... This is the best Playboy video I've ever seen  (this is a biased opinion, because I've only seen three or four in my  life)! It's loaded with a lot of beautiful women wearing some of the  sexiest lingerie around! Hosted by four of the most gorgeous women to cross  the the pages of Playboy - Deanne Brooks, Layla Roberts, Kelly Monaco, and  Christi Taylor (I can see why she's the 1999 Playboy Newstand Special Girl  of the year... she's extremely beautiful!) - this is the video to own if  you're a Playboy video collector, or if you're contemplating on buying one  (like I did).

The first scene alone is worth the price. The second scene alone is worth the price. The last scene alone is worth the price. Is the video worth the price. YES! YES! YES!
Why? Because these video full fills all the  men's dreams. And a few of women's dreams too.
Happy Watching.

The first scene had me wishing I was there filming with this gorgeous brunette.  She has huge breasts and a nice round tight a--.  I couldn't believe how hot these girls were.  I couldn't sleep at night and would  watch this every day.  I loved all the girls their bodies were so tight you  won't believe it.  Deanna Brooks, Vanessa Gleason and Jaime Bergman are the  three hottest.  I am not sure who the girl is in the first scene, but she  was probably the best, you won't believe your eyes!
